header.title: American Students and High Stakes Testing

title: American Students and High Stakes Testing
content:
The dumbing down of American students through high stake testing. James Horn is Associate Professor of Educational... <!--more--> Leadership at Cambridge College, Cambridge, MA.
He is also an education blogger at Schools Matter and has published widely on issues related to social justice in education.
Prof.
Horn has been one of our nationâ€™s more outspoken opponents of corporate education reform, the re-segregation of school systems, and high stakes testing models.
